amendment.description: To amend the definitions of eligible technology and technology readiness survey and to provide a restriction on funds.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2256 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2256 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator King to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S5098-5104; text: CR S5103-5104) To amend the definitions of eligible technology and technology readiness survey and to provide a restriction on funds.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2256 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2256 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator King to Amendment SA 2089.
